oml:parameter.oml:name: PolynominalbyBinominalClassification__classification_strategies
oml:parameter.oml:description: What strategy should be used for multi class classifications?

oml:parameter.oml:name: PolynominalbyBinominalClassification__local_random_seed
oml:parameter.oml:description: Specifies the local random seed

oml:parameter.oml:name: PolynominalbyBinominalClassification__random_code_multiplicator
oml:parameter.oml:description: A multiplicator regulating the codeword length in random code modus.

oml:parameter.oml:name: PolynominalbyBinominalClassification__use_local_random_seed
oml:parameter.oml:description: Indicates if a local random seed should be used.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__C
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM complexity constant. Use -1 for different C values for positive and negative.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__L_neg
oml:parameter.oml:description: A factor for the SVM complexity constant for negative examples

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__L_pos
oml:parameter.oml:description: A factor for the SVM complexity constant for positive examples

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__balance_cost
oml:parameter.oml:description: Adapts Cpos and Cneg to the relative size of the classes

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__calculate_weights
oml:parameter.oml:description: Indicates if attribute weights should be returned.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__convergence_epsilon
oml:parameter.oml:description: Precision on the KKT conditions

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__epsilon
oml:parameter.oml:description: Insensitivity constant. No loss if prediction lies this close to true value

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__epsilon_minus
oml:parameter.oml:description: Epsilon for negative deviation only

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__epsilon_plus
oml:parameter.oml:description: Epsilon for positive deviation only

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__estimate_performance
oml:parameter.oml:description: Indicates if this learner should also return a performance estimation.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_a
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter a.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_b
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter b.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_cache
oml:parameter.oml:description: Size of the cache for kernel evaluations im MB

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_degree
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter degree.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_gamma
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter gamma.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_shift
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter shift.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_sigma1
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter sigma1.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_sigma2
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter sigma2.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_sigma3
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel parameter sigma3.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__kernel_type
oml:parameter.oml:description: The SVM kernel type

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__max_iterations
oml:parameter.oml:description: Stop after this many iterations

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__quadratic_loss_neg
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use quadratic loss for negative deviation

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__quadratic_loss_pos
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use quadratic loss for positive deviation

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__return_optimization_performance
oml:parameter.oml:description: Indicates if final optimization fitness should be returned as performance.

oml:parameter.oml:name: SVM__scale
oml:parameter.oml:description: Scale the example values and store the scaling parameters for test set.
